          <title>
            <string language="sv">Skolan - ordkunskap 2</string>
            <string language="en">The school - lexicology 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schule - lexicology 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'école - lexicology 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escola - lexicology 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scuola - lexicology 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχολείο - lexicology 2</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på ord genom att para ihop dem med rätt förklaring.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Sverige 5.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, we accustom on words through mating them with correct explanation.

Module 6 - what wants to you? - Sweden 5.

Safir.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier gewöhnen uns wir auf Wörtern durch den 
Anschluß sie in korrektem explanation.Module 6 - was wünscht zu 
Ihnen? - Schweden 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, nous nous accoutumons sur des mots en les 
accouplant à explanation.Module correct 6 - que veut à vous ? 
- la Suède 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, nós acostumamo-nos em palavras com do 
acoplamento delas com o explanation.Module correto 6 - que lhe quer? 
- Sweden 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, accustom sulle parole through 
corrispondendole con explanation.Module corretto 6 - che cosa desidera
a voi? - la Svezia 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, εμείς accustom στις λέξεις μέσω του 
ζευγαρώματος τους με τη σωστή ενότητα 6 εξήγησης - τι θέλει σε 
σας; - Σουηδία 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí, nos acostumbramos en palabras con el 
acoplamiento de ellas con explanation.Module correcto 6 - qué desea a
usted? - Suecia 5.Safir.</string>
          </description>
